name: NoMoreLightInHell
description:
NoMoreLightInHell 🧟

An FPS Horror Survival Game 🌆

Use AWSD to move, click for action, space bar for jump, 'R' to reload flaregun and 'SHIFT' to run.

Synopsys:

You are alone out there and there is no light, look up for flare ammo, batteries for your spotlight, or use your lighter to find the correct path. 

Be aware! Looks like there is a zombie infection out there. Use rocks to make noise and distract zombies to reach the destination point.

Code:

https://github.com/panicoli0/NoMoreLightInHell  

Feedback, Feature Improvements, and Suggestions are more than welcome ☮️
